title: card: a module to play cards
text: This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.

title: card: a module to play cards
card: a module to play cards
text:
How to use
You need to import nbdev2_trybs.card.
First we create two global variables.

source

Card

 Card (suit:int, rank:int)

A playing card




Type
Details




suit
int
an integer index into suits


rank
int
an integer index into ranks



Creating a card:

c = Card(1, 4)

Printing it, two ways:

c

6 de Carreau



print(c)

6 de Carreau
